Description.Text: Offering a restaurant and a fitness centre, Hotel Saint Louis is located in Belo Horizonte. Free WiFi access is available. Within 2 km are Pampulha Lagoon and Mineirão Stadium. With a classic design, rooms at the hotel provide a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a minibar. Featuring a shower, the private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Extras include satellite channels. At Hotel Saint Louis there is a hot tub, a 24-hour front desk and a bar. Other facilities offered include meeting facilities, a shared lounge and luggage storage. The hotel is 5.8 km from Raul Soares Square and 5.5 km from Central Station. Carlos Drummond de Andrade Airport is a 2,5 km distance, while Tancredo Neves Airport is 26 km away.
